articles.title: Should Ireland's planning system take some of the blame for the housing crisis? - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: A European Commission report shows a 96% correlation between the number of planning permission grants and the number of homes completed two years later.
articles.content: PLANNING LAWS OFTEN take the rap for surging house prices. As the construction industry tells it, red tape ensnaring development and enabling NIMBY (not in my back yard) objections are part of the re… [+8967 chars]
